rows.label: qst701902_msg0001
rows.name:
Lieutenant Veronica. May I
speak with you for a second?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0002
rows.name: Yes, my Lord?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0003
rows.name:
We need something call "Dragon
Incense". It's found in Invidia.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0004
rows.name:
It's for a very sick little
girl in the capital. Do you
think you could get it for us?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0005
rows.name: Aye, I could.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0006
rows.name:
But returning to Invidia would be
dangerous at the present time. I'll
have to take a squad with me.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0007
rows.name: That sounds reasonable.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0008
rows.name: Who would you pick?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0009
rows.name: Well, I was thinking-

rows.label: qst701902_msg0010
rows.name: Never fear! We here!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0011
rows.name: These guys?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0012
rows.name:
If friends think we same Four
Muskerpon as you meet before,
friends sorely-poorly mistaken!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0013
rows.name:
We undergo extensive training from
Lieutenant Veronica! She said we
operate as one well-oiled machine!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0014
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Slow down there! What I actually said
was "together the four of you just
about make one competent recruit!"

rows.label: qst701902_msg0015
rows.name: Mo mo Mo-mo?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0016
rows.name:
Lieutenant Veronica is not
believer in Four Muskerpon?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0017
rows.name: I'm not sure about this.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0018
rows.name: I'll go too.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0019
rows.name:
I don't know about "Muskerpon", but
sending this lot without supervision
would be a big old mistake-apon.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0020
rows.name:
Having someone knowledgeable
about Invidia will help.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0021
rows.name:
It's still essentially
only a two-person team...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0022
rows.name:
That incense you're wanting is in
the Dragon's Stomach. It'll be no
easy feat making it in there.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0023
rows.name:
Ideally, we'd load up
on skilled allies...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0024
rows.name: We'd like to go too!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0025
rows.name:
Rita-san and Kaede-san! Oh,
and Dio too! Hello there.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0026
rows.name:
We spoke to Marena-san and she
told us what was going on. We
want to help Freja-chan as well!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0027
rows.name:
Rita is basically a Driver...kind
of... so it might up your
firepower a little.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0028
rows.name:
Kind of? Basically?
Whew, that's harsh...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0029
rows.name:
And I'm here because Zain-san
sent me to look after these two.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0030
rows.name:
With Dio on board, I suddenly
feel a lot better about this
mission's chances.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0031
rows.name: I'm here too!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0032
rows.name:
Um... Are you a warrior, Leo-san?
I don't quite recall...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0033
rows.name:
Not as such, but don't underestimate
me! I've got a fire in my belly
and that's all you need!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0034
rows.name:
When a comrade is on the verge of defeat
and despair, here come I! To energize
their spirit with a rousing song!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0035
rows.name:
I'm not sure that would do
anything for my despair.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0036
rows.name:
I do see your point but...
You know, I'm moved.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0037
rows.name:
That so many of the people we've
met on this journey would offer
their help. It's beautiful.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0038
rows.name: Yeah! That makes me so happy.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0039
rows.name: Doesn't it!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0040
rows.name:
I think these (effectively) five
people should be an able enough squad
to get the Dragon Incense you need.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0041
rows.name: Right then, so-

rows.label: qst701902_msg0042
rows.name: WAIT!!!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0043
rows.name: Chairman Morumo?!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0044
rows.name: Morumo go too!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0045
rows.name: But...why?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0046
rows.name: Morumo loves capital.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0047
rows.name:
And Morumo also love peoples
who live in capital.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0048
rows.name:
But is sad fact that Morumo
betrayed them, will not deny.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0049
rows.name:
So Morumo want to wipe slate clean,
so to speak. Morumo is prepared to
offer tasty body as bait for monsters.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0050
rows.name: That's quite a proposal.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0051
rows.name: So we're up to, basically, six people?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0052
rows.name:
Seems so. But I would really prefer
it if everyone came back alive. No
need for any kind of sacrifice, yeah?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0053
rows.name:
My Lord, would you mind choosing
a leader for the expedition?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0054
rows.name:
Ah, yes. We know these folks
well, but there are probably some
who you're not familiar with.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0055
rows.name:
A good leader is necessary to ensure
that the operation goes smoothly.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0056
rows.name: Laura who should we go with?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0057
rows.name: It's up to me?!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0058
rows.name:
You're kind of the center of
this web of connections.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0059
rows.name:
I really think you should pick, though.
You have a better idea of everyone's
character and skills and whatnot.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0060
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Hmmm... Who would be the best leader?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0061
rows.name: Who's it going to be?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0101
rows.name: Dio

rows.label: qst701902_msg0102
rows.name: Rita

rows.label: qst701902_msg0103
rows.name: Ryuuryuu

rows.label: qst701902_msg0104
rows.name: Augusto

rows.label: qst701902_msg0105
rows.name: Leo

rows.label: qst701902_msg0106
rows.name: Morumo

rows.label: qst701902_msg0107
rows.name: Choose someone else

rows.label: qst701902_msg0201
rows.name: Dio! Will you lead?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0202
rows.name: Yeah, sure thing.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0211
rows.name: Rita! We're counting on you!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0212
rows.name: M-me?!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0213
rows.name:
I hope I can do it... With Kaede-chan's
help, I'm sure I can manage.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0221
rows.name: OK, Ryuuryuu, it's on you!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0222
rows.name: Woo-hoo-hoo!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0223
rows.name:
Ryuuryuu never commanded
so many people before!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0231
rows.name:
Augusto, you seem like
the man for the job.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0232
rows.name: Me?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0233
rows.name:
Yeah, makes sense I suppose. I know
Invidia better than anyone here.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0241
rows.name: Leon, would you mind taking the lead?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0242
rows.name: Nooooooo problemo, oh bosom buddy!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0243
rows.name:
If it's anywhere near Fons Maim,
it will be a good opportunity
to let Deetta down gently.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0251
rows.name:
Chairman Morumo, would
you do the honors?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0252
rows.name:
Leave it to Morumo! Morumo
already chairman of Chamber of
Commerce, so is no problemo.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0253
rows.name:
Morumo astutely identify
everyone's core competencies
and assign roles as necessary!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0301
rows.name:
Well, that's the leader sorted.
But everyone is going to have to
chip in to get the job done.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0302
rows.name: Indeed.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0303
rows.name:
Let's get going! "Strike while
the ether's hot," as they say.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0304
rows.name:
Can any of friends pilot
Divine Beast ship?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0305
rows.name: Not me.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0306
rows.name:
If nobody else can, I could give
it a go. How hard can it be?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0307
rows.name:
I'd rather not end up at the
bottom of the Cloud Sea, thanks.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0308
rows.name:
Looks like we need a
talented helmswoman.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0309
rows.name: A talented helmswoman, you say...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0310
rows.name: You're thinking Maquia?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0311
rows.name:
I'm sure we'll find
her at Yajika Harbor.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0312
rows.name: Then let's have a look there!
